titleStmt.title: Six learned and godly sermons preached some of them before the Kings Maiestie, some before Queene Elizabeth / by Richard Eedes ...
titleStmt.author: Eedes, Richard, 1555-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Adam Islip, for Edward Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: First four p. unsigned; B-Q⁸, R².
Reproductions of originals in: British Library and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
